trans-unit.source: Represents parameters passed to <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler"></xref> during the compilation process.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters"></xref> class, with the names of the assemblies used in compilation.
The names of the assemblies used in compilation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters"></xref> class from an existing instance.
The instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters)"></xref> used to initialize the new instance.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters"></xref> class, with the names of the assemblies used in compilation, and the name to apply to the output file.
The names of the assemblies used in compilation.
The name to apply to the output file.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters"></xref> class, with the names of the assemblies used in compilation, and the name to apply to the output file, and the designator for inclusion of debug information.
The names of the assemblies used in compilation.
The name to apply to the output file.
Indicates whether a PDB file should be generated for debugging.
Gets or sets a string that contains command-line options for this compilation.
A string that contains command-line options for this compilation.
Gets or sets a value which indicates whether to generate only a <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref>, or to call the C# or Visual Basic compiler to generate the executable or DLL.
A value which indicates whether to generate only a <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> , or to call the C# or Visual Basic compiler to generate the executable or DLL.
Gets or sets a string which contains the language to use in compilation of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref>.
A string which contains the language to use in compilation of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref>.
Gets the property that represents a collection of directory names under which compiler looks for referenced assemblies.
The compiler adds standard library paths to the collection.
The property that represents a collection of directory names under which compiler looks for referenced assemblies.
Gets or sets the collection of code compile units which will be used in this invocation of the workflow compiler.
The collection of code compile units which will be used in this invocation of the workflow compiler.
